tool_description: Manages the actual distribution of job postings across multiple platforms, tracking success and handling failures.

posting_schedule.description: Scheduled posting times for each platform

notification_email.description: Email address for distribution status notifications

test_mode.description: Whether to run in test mode without actual posting

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: formatted_postings, platform_credentials, and posting_schedule must have same length.
Invalid credentials: One or more platform credentials are invalid or expired.
Platform API error: Unable to connect to one or more platforms.
Posting quota exceeded: Daily posting limit reached for one or more platforms.
Invalid email format: Notification email must be a valid email address.
Schedule conflict: One or more posting times are in the past or conflict with platform restrictions.
usage: Provide arrays of formatted postings, platform credentials, and posting schedule with matching indices. Enable retry for failed posts and specify notification preferences.

successful_postings.description: List of successful postings with platform and ID

failed_postings.description: List of failed postings with error details

posting_urls.description: URLs of successfully posted job listings

total_reach.description: Estimated total audience reach across platforms
